package.name: single-steno
package.author: reiwa
package.description: Convert single characters into the most common English words
package.title: Single Steno

manifest.name: single-steno
manifest.title: Single Steno
manifest.description: Convert single characters into the most common English words
manifest.author: reiwa

value.readme:
# About
**single-steno** is an Estenso package that converts single character inputs into the 26 most commonly used words in the English language.

# Conversions
b → because
c → come
d → could
e → even
f → for
g → give
h → have
i → I
j → just
k → know
l → like
m → most
n → and
N → not
o → other
p → people
q → question
r → are
s → some
t → the
u → under
v → very
w → with
x → exactly
y → you
z → these

# Notes
- Since `a` is a word already, it has no conversion.
- Lowercase `i` gets automatically converted into uppercase `I`, removing the need to push the shift key.
- `n` is mapped to `and`. Since a sentence cannot start with `and` it can never be uppercase. This leaves us free to map uppercase `N` to `not`.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - trigger: "b"
    replace: "because"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "c"
    replace: "come"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "d"
    replace: "could"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "e"
    replace: "even"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "f"
    replace: "for"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "g"
    replace: "give"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "h"
    replace: "have"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "i"
    replace: "I"
    word: true

  - trigger: "j"
    replace: "just"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "k"
    replace: "know"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "l"
    replace: "like"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "m"
    replace: "most"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "n"
    replace: "and"
    word: true

  - trigger: "N"
    replace: "not"
    word: true

  - trigger: "o"
    replace: "other"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "p"
    replace: "people"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "q"
    replace: "question"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "r"
    replace: "are"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "s"
    replace: "some"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "t"
    replace: "the"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "u"
    replace: "under"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "v"
    replace: "very"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "w"
    replace: "with"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "x"
    replace: "exactly"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "y"
    replace: "you"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true

  - trigger: "z"
    replace: "these"
    propagate_case: true
    uppercase_style: "capitalize_words"
    word: true
